items: Kritter blasts a long one out of Mario Stadium for the first Homerun of the season and of USA history!
Funky Kong up at the mound and gets the first Strikeout of the season!
Star Diddy with a sneaky Homerun! That’s one for the Underdogs!
It’s a game to forget for Baby Luigi who strikes 3 ATB’s all leading to double plays…
Gotta wonder if the precharge nerf has Bowser down bad just hitting 1 for 4 with a double play…
An amazing 4/5 batting and a solo Homerun as Birdo tried to backpack the Batters!
With just 1 game down Britter puts in incredible work on both ends of the field with 2 RBI’s and possibly a play of the season defensive reverse diving catch!
Beast mode performance for Ronald at the Pitching mound, only game 1 and completely shuts out the Bombers!
Top 3 picks DK and Petey with an uncharacteristically quiet game. Fraud alert?
Fun Fact: Bombers and Dreary Lane both had Piantas out there.. But you couldn’t really tell..
100% Batting AVG 4/4 with a Homerun, a dominant performance by Fire Bro!
Baby Peach unstoppable while on the pitching mound allowing no runs during her time.
Clutch Bowser Jr. Strikeout to close out the game!
Solo Homerun into a Strikeout! Wiggler can do it all!

With indisputably best game 1 of the night Boomerang Bro hits 3/4, drives out 2 Homeruns then smacks in a Homerun into the back of the train cart for style points! Not to mention his 6 RBI’s. Gameday 1 MVP!
